title: The new Messiah
author: VD
content_html:
Jonah Goldberg writes on NRO:

This morning I heard David Keane of the American Conservative Union say that an attack on Tom Delay’s ethics was an attack on conservatives everywhere and upon everything they stand for.

And here I thought that it was George Delano that we were supposed to reverence now. I’m getting so confused.
content_text:
Jonah Goldberg writes on NRO:
This morning I heard David Keane of the American Conservative Union say that an attack on Tom Delay’s ethics was an attack on conservatives everywhere and upon everything they stand for.
And here I thought that it was George Delano that we were supposed to reverence now.  I’m getting so confused.
